content: yarn in the place where you will sew the beige spot see photo↓ sew the beige spot working in flo see photo↑ sew or glue the eyes embroider the nose and mouth with black mouliné thread you can use other threads if you want to make a keychain attach the base for the keychain on top @abelya toys your little dog is ready feel free to tag me @abelya toys in your photos on instagram if you d like @abelya toys
